item.title: Need TuT reward : adminship
item.dc:creator: @Angel_of_grim Angel of grim
item.description:
@Angel_of_grim wrote:

ok just add this with ur custom commands

(this is for online/offline thing)

if (npcs[i].npcType == npcidhere) { if (misc.random2(25) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("yournamehere")){ npcs[i].textUpdate = "Owner younamehere is ONLINE and owning"; } else{ npcs[i].textUpdate = "Owner yournamehere is OFFLINE but coding!"; } } }(this 1 for say sumthin)

if (npcs[i].npcType == npcidhere) { if (misc.random2(20) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "your message here"; } }

Read full topic
